Iâ€™m passionate about data-driven impact, with experience in research, project management, and client relations across agriculture, renewable energy, and micro-finance.
I enjoy translating ideas into action, delivering meaningful end-to-end programs, solving complex challenges with cross-functional teams, fostering collaboration through engaging meetings, and building shared value relationships with communities, partners, and donors/investors.
Outside of work, I enjoy music, football, Formula One, and a lot of other sports.
At the moment, I am exploring roles that focus on:

Health Sciences: research, data analytics, bioinformatics
Project Delivery: within development sectors
Innovation: pilots, initiatives, processes
Strategy & Transformation
Data Management

I am also open to interesting conversations about where I can add value!
